title: Gwyneth Paltrow’s 2025 Goop Detox: The Exact 7-Day Cleanse She Swears Makes Her Look 10 Years Younger
shortdescription: GP just dropped her new post-holiday reset everyone is copying.
author: Jane Doe

content.content: Gwyneth Paltrow just launched her infamous 2025 Goop Detox — and it sold out in 19 hours. The $1,200 kit includes everything GP uses for her extreme 7-day post-holiday cleanse.

Days 1–3: Bone broth + green juice fast
Day 4: Reintroduce steamed vegetables
Days 5–7: Wild salmon, avocado, quinoa
Daily: Infrared sauna 45 min, IV drip (NAD+ & glutathione), dry brushing, $600 supplement stack
Gwyneth claims it “resets cellular age” and makes her skin glow like she’s 35 again. Doctors call it extreme — but Goop says waitlist is now 40,000+.
